item.title: Rasp Cm3
item.description: 如何將 OS image 寫進 Raspberry Pi CM1/CM3 準備工作 Download and run the Windows installer to install the drivers and boot tool. Plug your host PC USB into the CMIO USB SLAVE port, making sure J4 is set to the EN position. Apply power to the CMIO board; Windows should now find the hardware and install the driver. Once the driver installation is complete, run the RPiBoot.exe tool that was previously installed.
